Constructor Detail

NexmoInsightClient

public NexmoInsightClient(java.lang.String endpointBaseUrl,
                          java.lang.String endpointPath,
                          java.lang.String apiKey,
                          java.lang.String apiSecret,
                          int connectionTimeout,
                          int soTimeout,
                          boolean signRequests,
                          java.lang.String signatureSecretKey)
Parameters:
endpointBaseUrl - The base URL of the api endpoint, e.g "https://rest.nexmo.com"
endpointPath - The path to append to endpointBaseUrl e.g "/ni/json" OR "/ni/xml". Must start with "/".
apiKey - Your API public Key
apiSecret - Your API secret Key
connectionTimeout - Http connection timeout for this client
soTimeout - Read timeout for this client
signRequests - Should we generate a signature for this request using the secret key?
signatureSecretKey - The secret key we will use to generate the signatures for signed requests

Method Detail

submit

public void submit(InsightRequest request)
            throws java.lang.Exception
Submits a request to the number insight API and returns nothing. Check the callback URL for response.

Parameters:
request - A InsightRequest Object
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
